mapper.select: SELECT lgroupId, lgroupOwner, lgroupType, lgroupMax, lgroupName, lgroupDate, lgroupDetail FROM LGroup WHERE lgroupId = #{lgroupId} ORDER BY lgroupDate DESC

SELECT lgroupId, lgroupOwner, lgrouptype, lgroupMax, lgroupName, lgroupDate, lgroupDetail FROM LGroup, LChar WHERE LGroup.lgroupOnwer = LChar.lcharId AND LChar.lcharName = #{onwerName} ORDER BY lgroupDate DESC
SELECT lgroupId, lgroupOwner, lgroupType, lgroupMax, lgroupName, lgroupDate, lgroupDetail FROM LGroup WHERE lgroupDetail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{lgroupDetail},'%') ORDER BY lgroupDate DESC
SELECT lgroupId, lgroupOwner, lgroupType, lgroupMax, lgroupName, lgroupDate, lgroupDetail FROM LGroup WHERE lgroupName Like CONCAT('%',#{lgroupName},'%') ORDER BY lgroupDate DESC
SELECT lgroupId, lgroupOwner, lgroupType, lgroupMax, lgroupName, lgroupDate, lgroupDetail FROM LGroup ORDER BY lgroupDate DESC LIMIT #{min}, #{max}
